description:
The members of the official newspaper club are suddenly called together by Ricca. As they walk along the cherry blossom lined road without knowing why, Sakura appears before them. Kiyotaka and the others greet her with a smile, but Sakura tells them she`s decided to leave the island and asks them to play with her today.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Island of the Everlasting Cherry Blossom
